cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.27)
project(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies DESCRIPTION "A Basic Game Enine's Dependencies" LANGUAGES CXX HOMEPAGE_URL "https://github.com/ShoweryCellar34/Ghoul-Engine")
add_library(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies STATIC "Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies-Wrapper.hpp")
set_target_properties(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)


set(SDL_SHARED OFF CACHE BOOL "Build a shared version of the library")
set(SDL_STATIC ON CACHE BOOL "Build a static version of the library")
set(SDL_STATIC_PIC ON CACHE BOOL "Static version of the library should be built with Position Independent Code")
add_subdirectory(SDL)
target_link_libraries(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC SDL3::SDL3)
target_include_directories(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC SDL3::Headers)

set(sdl3_opengl3 ON CACHE BOOL "sdl3_opengl3")
get_target_property(SDL3_header_path SDL3::Headers INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES)
set(include_paths ${SDL3_header_path} CACHE STRING "include_paths")
add_subdirectory(imgui)
target_link_libraries(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC imgui)
target_include_directories(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC imgui)

add_subdirectory(glm)
target_include_directories(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC glm)

add_subdirectory(glad)
target_link_libraries(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC glad)
target_include_directories(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies PUBLIC glad)
